aliens.name: Heatblast
aliens.body_type: Humanoid made of molten rock and fire
aliens.about: A fiery Pyronite from the star Pyros, Heatblast wields intense flames and molten rock, capable of both destruction and flight.

aliens.name: Wildmutt
aliens.about: A blind, beastly Vulpimancer from Vulpin, Wildmutt relies on heightened senses and brute force to tackle foes.

aliens.name: Diamondhead
aliens.about: A durable Petrosapien from Petropia, Diamondhead uses crystalline strength and sharp projectiles to dominate battles.

aliens.name: XLR8
aliens.about: A lightning-fast Kineceleran from Kinet, XLR8 races through challenges with unmatched speed and agility.

aliens.name: Grey Matter
aliens.about: A tiny, brilliant Galvan from Galvan Prime, Grey Matter excels in intellect and tinkering with technology.

aliens.name: Four Arms
aliens.about: A towering Tetramand from Khoros, Four Arms uses his immense strength and four fists to overpower enemies.

aliens.name: Stinkfly
aliens.about: A winged Lepidopterran from Lepidopterra, Stinkfly soars and spits sticky slime to trap foes.

aliens.name: Ripjaws
aliens.about: An aquatic Piscciss Volann from Piscciss, Ripjaws thrives underwater with strong jaws and swift swimming.

aliens.name: Upgrade
aliens.about: A versatile Galvanic Mechamorph from Galvan B, Upgrade merges with tech to enhance or reshape it.

aliens.name: Ghostfreak
aliens.about: A spectral Ectonurite from Anur Phaetos, Ghostfreak haunts with intangibility and possession powers.

aliens.name: Cannonbolt
aliens.about: A tough Arburian Pelarota from Arburia, Cannonbolt rolls into a ball to smash through obstacles.

aliens.name: Wildvine
aliens.about: A plant-based Florauna from Flors Verdance, Wildvine ensnares foes with vines and regenerates damage.

aliens.name: Spitter
aliens.about: A Spheroid from Scalpasc, Spitter inflates to spit powerful slime streams at enemies.

aliens.name: Buzzshock
aliens.about: A tiny Nosedeenian from Nosedeen Quasar, Buzzshock zaps with electricity and multiplies when charged.

aliens.name: Arctiguana
aliens.about: A chilly Polar Manzardill from X’Nelli, Arctiguana freezes foes with icy breath and thrives in cold.

aliens.name: Blitzwolfer
aliens.about: A Loboan from Luna Lobo, Blitzwolfer howls with sonic force and tears into enemies with claws.

aliens.name: Perk Upchuck
aliens.about: A Perk Gourmand from Peptos XI, Perk Upchuck eats anything and spits explosive energy balls.

aliens.name: Murk Upchuck
aliens.body_type: Small frog-like humanoid with darker coloration
aliens.about: A darker Murk Gourmand from Peptos XI, Murk Upchuck devours and regurgitates energy with precision.

aliens.name: Snare-oh
aliens.about: A Thep Khufan from Anur Khufos, Snare-oh wraps enemies in bandages and regenerates effortlessly.

aliens.name: Frankenstrike
aliens.about: A Transylian from Anur Transyl, Frankenstrike channels electricity and brute force in combat.

aliens.name: Eye Guy
aliens.about: An Opticoid from Sightra, Eye Guy blasts energy from his many eyes with all-around vision.

aliens.name: Way Big
aliens.about: A colossal To’kustar born in cosmic storms, Way Big crushes foes with sheer size and cosmic power.

aliens.name: Ditto
aliens.about: A playful Splixson from Hathor, Ditto multiplies himself to outnumber and outmaneuver opponents.

aliens.name: Swampfire
aliens.about: A Methanosian from Methanos, Swampfire blends fire and plant powers with a knack for regeneration.

aliens.name: Echo Echo
aliens.about: A Sonorosian from Sonorosia, Echo Echo uses sonic screams and duplication to overwhelm enemies.

aliens.name: Humungousaur
aliens.about: A mighty Vaxasaurian from Terradino, Humungousaur grows massive to crush foes with raw power.

aliens.name: Jetray
aliens.about: An Aerophibian from Aeropela, Jetray soars at high speeds and stuns with neuroshock blasts.

aliens.name: Big Chill
aliens.about: A Necrofriggian from Kylmyys, Big Chill freezes foes with icy breath and phases through obstacles.

aliens.name: Chromastone
aliens.about: A Crystalsapien from Petropia, Chromastone absorbs energy and unleashes it as powerful light.

aliens.name: Brainstorm
aliens.about: A Cerebrocrustacean from Encephalonus IV, Brainstorm shocks with intellect and electric powers.

aliens.name: Spidermonkey
aliens.about: An Arachnichimp from Aranhascimmia, Spidermonkey swings and traps foes with agile webbing.

aliens.name: Goop
aliens.about: A Polymorph from Viscosia, Goop morphs and melts through anything with acidic slime.

aliens.name: Alien X
aliens.about: A Celestialsapien from the Forge of Creation, Alien X wields ultimate power, limited by internal debate.

aliens.name: Lodestar
aliens.about: A Biosovortian from a magnetic world, Lodestar controls metal with magnetic might.

aliens.name: Rath
aliens.about: A fierce Appoplexian from Appoplexia, Rath rages into battle with claws and raw power.

aliens.name: Nanomech
aliens.about: A hybrid from Earth, Nanomech shrinks to microscopic size to infiltrate and zap foes.

aliens.name: Water Hazard
aliens.about: An Orishan from the Andromeda Galaxy, Water Hazard blasts water and thrives in aquatic combat.

aliens.name: Ampfibian
aliens.about: An Amperi from the Andromeda Galaxy, Ampfibian shocks and phases with electric finesse.

aliens.name: Armodrillo
aliens.about: A Talpaedan from Terraexcava, Armodrillo drills through earth and shakes the ground with power.

aliens.name: Terraspin
aliens.about: A Geochelone Aerio from Aldabra, Terraspin spins to create wind and shield with his shell.

aliens.name: NRG
aliens.about: A Prypiatosian-B from the Andromeda Galaxy, NRG radiates heat and power from his armored suit.

aliens.name: Fasttrack
aliens.about: A Citrakayah from Chalybeas, Fasttrack dashes with feline speed and strength.

aliens.name: Clockwork
aliens.about: A Chronosapien of unknown origin, Clockwork bends time with mechanical precision.

aliens.name: Chamalien
aliens.about: A stealthy Merlinisapien, Chamalien vanishes and strikes with a chameleon’s cunning.

aliens.name: Eatle
aliens.about: An Oryctini from Coleop Terra, Eatle devours matter to fire powerful energy beams.

aliens.name: Juryrigg
aliens.about: A Planchaküle gremlin, Juryrigg breaks and builds tech with chaotic brilliance.

aliens.name: Shocksquatch
aliens.about: A Gimlinopithecus from Pattersonea, Shocksquatch electrifies and smashes with yeti-like might.

aliens.name: Feedback
aliens.about: A Conductoid from Teslavorr, Feedback absorbs and redirects energy with tendril precision.

aliens.name: Bloxx
aliens.about: A Segmentasapien from Polyominus, Bloxx reshapes his blocky body to build or bash.

aliens.name: Gravattack
aliens.about: A Galilean from Keplorr, Gravattack bends gravity to control the battlefield.

aliens.name: Crashhopper
aliens.about: An Orthopterran, Crashhopper leaps with explosive force to crash into foes.

aliens.name: Ball Weevil

first_appearance.episode_name: So Long, and Thanks for All the Smoothies

aliens.about: A tiny beetle-like alien, Ball Weevil rolls plasma balls to detonate on impact.

aliens.name: Walkatrout
aliens.about: An Ickthyperambuloid from Gilli-Perambulous Promenade, Walkatrout slips and swims with ease.

aliens.name: Pesky Dust
aliens.about: A Nemuina from Nemunimos IV, Pesky Dust sprinkles sleep dust to manipulate dreams.

aliens.name: Mole-Stache
aliens.about: A mole-like alien, Mole-Stache uses his versatile mustache to dig and grapple.

aliens.name: The Worst
aliens.about: An Atrocian, The Worst endures pain and damage but lacks any real fighting prowess.

aliens.name: Kickin Hawk
aliens.about: A hawk-like fighter, Kickin Hawk delivers swift, powerful kicks with avian precision.

aliens.name: Toepick
aliens.about: A grotesque alien, Toepick terrifies and sickens foes with his horrifying visage.

aliens.name: Astrodactyl
aliens.about: A pterosaur-like alien, Astrodactyl soars and lashes out with energy whips and sonic roars.

aliens.name: Bullfrag
aliens.about: An Incursean warrior, Bullfrag leaps and lashes with a frog’s strength and agility.

aliens.name: Atomix
aliens.about: A robotic powerhouse, Atomix unleashes nuclear energy and brute force in equal measure.

aliens.name: Gutrot
aliens.about: A chemical genius, Gutrot brews and releases potent gases to control the fight.

aliens.name: Whampire
aliens.about: A Vladat from Anur Vladias, Whampire mesmerizes and drains energy with vampiric flair.
